newsitem.title: USA: Noble Affiliates to set $350 mln in debt.
newsitem.headline: Noble Affiliates to set $350 mln in debt.

text.p: Noble Affiliates Inc is expected to tap the corporate bond primary market with a $350 million two-part debt offering on Tuesday, syndicate sources said.
The Baa2/BBB rated deal is expected to consist of $100 million in 100-year bonds and $250 million ln 30-year bonds, sources said.
Price talk is seen in the low 100 basis points over Treasuries area for the century bond and in the low 90's area for the 30-year bond, they said.

The offering, which will be underwritten by joint managers Morgan Stanley & Co Inc and UBS Securities, is expected to price later this morning after an 1100 EST/1600 GMT conference call, sources added.
